snippet: Stuck in last place in the A.L. East, the Red Sox and Manager Bobby Valentine could salvage some respect if they can block the Yankees’ road to the playoffs.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observes that the Boston Red Sox and manager Bobby Valentine could salvage some respect by spoiling the New York Yankees’ playoffs chances.
lead_paragraph: Stuck in last place in the A.L. East, the Red Sox and Manager Bobby Valentine could salvage some respect if they can block the Yankees’ road to the playoffs.

headline.seo: Bobby Valentine and Red Sox Still Have Something to Play For
headline.main: For Valentine, a Ruined Season and Spoiler’s Role
headline.print_headline: After Months of Despair, Trying to Salvage the Final Days
